text: We’re going to be able to sell much more than double the number of automobiles that we were allowed under a deal that was totally defective that was there before.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And so we’re very happy with that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That deal is actually concluded.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re very well along the way with Mexico.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The relationship is very good.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And with Canada, we’ll see what happens.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re charging us 300-percent tariffs on dairy products.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We can’t have that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We can’t have that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: With China, as you know, we put out an announcement today.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They would like to see me lose an election because they’ve never been challenged like this.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I want to open up China to our farmers and to our industrialists and our companies.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And China is not open, but we’re open to them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They charge us 25, 35, 55 percent for things, and we charge them nothing in terms of coming into the country.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Cars, they’re at 25 percent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we’re at 2 percent and 2.5 percent, and don’t even collect it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But we collect it now.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So we’re doing very well in our situation with China on trade.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have a great relationship with the President of China, President Xi.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But it’s got to be a two-way street.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It — for 25 years and longer, it was not.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And trillions and trillions of dollars was taken out of the United States for the benefit of China.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We just can’t have that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have to make it fair.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So we’re at $250 billion now, at 25 percent interest.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And a lot of money is coming into our coffers.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it’s had no impact on our — absolutely, by the way, no impact on our economy, which I said it wouldn’t.

speaker: TRUMP
text: In fact, steel is like the hottest industry there is.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If you look at what happened with steel, we’re charging a 25 percent tariff for the dumpers.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They dump massive amounts of steel.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They want to put the steel companies out of business.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And after they’re out of business, they’ll come in and charge five times more than you ever thought possible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we need steel and we need aluminum.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And those industries are doing well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But steel is incredible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: U.S. Steel is opening up a minimum of eight plants.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Nucor is opening up plants.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And these are big plants — $750 million and a billion dollar plants, in some cases.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So what’s happening with the steel industry is very exciting to me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s being rebuilt overnight.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If you look at the miners in coal, if you look at energy, LNG — Japan just gave us some numbers that are incredible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re doubling the amount that they are going to be buying for Japan.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re taking the LNG and they’re doubling it up.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "You have to do me a favor. We don’t want these big deficits. You’re going to have to buy more"

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re buying massive amounts of equipment and military equipment, and other countries are doing the same thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because we have trade imbalances with almost everybody.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a rare exception that we don’t.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So we are doing great as a country.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Unfortunately, they just raised interest rates a little bit because we are doing so well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m not happy about that, because I know it’s going to be a question.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I am not happy about that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’d rather pay down debt or do other things, create more jobs.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So I’m worried about the fact that they seem to like raising interest rates.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We can do other things with the money.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And — but they raised them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they’re raising them because we’re doing so well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, we’re doing much better than I had projected in terms of — when I was campaigning, I said we were going to do this and we’re doing much better than anybody ever thought possible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And, I will say, if others got in, it would have been just the opposite because they were going to put restrictions on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They were going to put regulations on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They were going to choke the economy as it was already choking, but it would have been worse.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they were going to raise your taxes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s what they want to do now if they ever got control, which I don’t think they’ll have control for a long time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, with that being said, we’ll take some questions and — yes, please.

speaker: TRUMP
text: John, go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have plenty of time.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, thank you very much.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Of course, what you’re looking forward to tomorrow is the hearings with Judge Kavanaugh —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes.

speaker: QUESTION
text: — before the Judiciary Committee.

speaker: QUESTION
text: In 1991, when Joe Biden passed along to the Bush 41 White House the allegations that Anita Hill had raised against Clarence Thomas, the Bush White House asked the FBI to look into it as part of Judge Thomas’s background investigation — not a criminal investigation, but the background investigation.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Right.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Right.

speaker: QUESTION
text: When these allegations were raised, why didn’t this White House do the same thing?

speaker: QUESTION
text: And with all of the allegations that are coming out now about Judge Kavanaugh, was there an opportunity missed here to have investigators look into this and get some sort of clarity one way or the other?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, the FBI told us they’ve investigated Judge Kavanaugh six times, five times, many times over the years.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They know him very well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But here, there was nothing to investigate from at least one standpoint.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They didn’t know the location.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They didn’t know the time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They didn’t know the year.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They didn’t know anything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it’s like, where do you go?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Also, it’s not for the FBI.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If you look at what Joe Biden said, he said, "They don’t do this"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he said it very clearly.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So I think when you really look at it all, it’s not going to change any of the Democrats’ minds.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re obstructionists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re actually con artists because they know how quality this man is and they’ve destroyed a man’s reputation and they want to destroy it even more.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I think people are going to see that in the midterms.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What they’ve done to this family, what they’ve done to these children — these beautiful children of his — and what they’ve done to his wife.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they know it’s a big, fat con job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they go into a room and, I guarantee you, they laugh like hell at what they’ve pulled off on you and on the public.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They laugh like hell.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, it wouldn’t have mattered if the FBI came back with the cleanest score.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you understand that very well, John.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If they would have come back with the most perfect — "We found everything, and he’s perfectly innocent of everything"

speaker: TRUMP
text: It wouldn’t have made a difference.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You wouldn’t have gotten one vote.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now we will get votes from the Democrats if we win.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You’ll have three, four, or five Democrats giving us votes, because they’re in states that I won by 30 and 40 points and they’re going to give us votes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But other than that, you probably won’t get any, John.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, there are now three women accusing Judge Kavanaugh of sexual misconduct.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Are you saying that all three of those women are liars?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Is there anything that can be said at this point tomorrow —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah.

speaker: QUESTION
text: — that could cause you to withdraw the nomination?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Anything at all that —

speaker: TRUMP
text: I won’t get into that game.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ll only tell you this: This is one of the highest quality people that I’ve ever met, and everybody that knows him says the same thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And these are all false — to me, these are false accusations in certain cases.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And certain cases, even the media agrees with that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can only say that, what they’ve done to this man is incredible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, it’s very interesting — I pick a lot of judges.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have 145 judges I will be picking by the end of a fairly short period of time because President Obama wasn’t big on picking judges.

speaker: TRUMP
text: When I got there, I said, "How is this possible?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have 145 — including court of appeals — judges.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they just didn’t do it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know why?

speaker: TRUMP
text: They got tired.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They got complacent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Something happened.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have 145 judges.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everybody wants to be a federal judge.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Not just a Supreme Court judge, I’m talking about court of appeals; I’m talking about district court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t think they’re going to want to so much.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ll be calling people, and we’ll have people calling people that do this.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And people are going to be scared because we could say it about you, "Thirty-five years ago, you met some…" — and you might know — you might not know what’s going on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What is going on?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why did they wait so long?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why did Senator Feinstein wait until the hearings were over and make this case?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why didn’t she bring it right at the beginning?

speaker: TRUMP
text: When you ask about, as an example, the FBI — why didn’t they bring this right at the beginning, during the hearing?

speaker: TRUMP
text: You would have had all the time in the world for the FBI.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It would have been fine.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now the FBI, as you know, did investigate this time, as they have five or six other times.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they did a very thorough investigation.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But this is a big con job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I would love to be in the room with the Democrats, close the door — you guys are all away, outside, waiting.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And Schumer and his buddies are all in there laughing how they fooled you all.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Let’s just stop them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A big fat con.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah, go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But, Mr. President, if I could follow up.

speaker: QUESTION
text: You have daughters.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Can you understand why a victim of sexual assault would not report it at the time?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Don’t you understand —

speaker: TRUMP
text: By the way, I only say this: thirty-six years — no charge, no nothing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everybody —

speaker: QUESTION
text: But — but that happens often.

speaker: QUESTION
text: I mean —

speaker: TRUMP
text: People are going to have to make a decision.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Thirty-six years, there’s no charge.

speaker: TRUMP
text: All of a sudden, the hearings are over and the rumors start coming out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then you have this other con artist, Avenatti, come out with another beauty today.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I only say that you have to look at the facts.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The senators are very capable people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re very good people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I know many of them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re friends of mine.

speaker: TRUMP
text: These are very talented, very good people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they’re going to vote.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re going to believe what they believe.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can — when I look at what’s happened to the reputation of a great gentleman — a great intellect; a brilliant man; somebody that has a chance to be one of our great Supreme Court Justices in history, intellectually — I think it’s a shame.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, please.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Yes, Mr. President.

speaker: QUESTION
text: My name is Tomás Regalado from Radio and TV Marti.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, yesterday at the speech at the U.N., you spoke about how Venezuela’s problem was because of Cuba and the Castros — how they went in there and they brought socialism and communism to Venezuela, and now to Nicaragua as well.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, are you going to be more proactive now against Cuba as well?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve been very proactive against Cuba.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t like what’s happening in Cuba.

speaker: TRUMP
text: As you know, President Obama gave them a pass and I didn’t like it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Neither do Cuban people based in Miami and based in our country that came from Cuba and suffered in Cuba.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t like what he did.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve ended much of it — most of it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t like what’s happening in Cuba, and I certainly don’t like what’s happening in Venezuela.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, please.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, just to finish really fast.

speaker: QUESTION
text: You said also that you had a call-to-action to ask the leaders around the world to also end socialism.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Would you like to be recognized as —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, I wouldn’t say that socialism has been working really well around the world, okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You can take a look at Venezuela as your number one — your number one — I guess, the one that is most obvious.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you take a look around the world, socialism is not exactly riding high.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Thank you, Mr. President.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Thank you very much.

speaker: QUESTION
text: If you don’t mind, after I’m finished, if Weijia, or Hallie, or Vivian, or one of our female colleagues could go after me, that would be great.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, just to follow up on these allegations against Brett Kavanaugh —

speaker: TRUMP
text: What does he mean by that?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Explain.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What does that mean?

speaker: QUESTION
text: I think it would be great if a female reporter —

speaker: TRUMP
text: What does it mean?

speaker: TRUMP
text: No, what does it mean?

speaker: QUESTION
text: I think it would great if a female reporter would ask you a question about this issue.

speaker: QUESTION
text: So if you don’t mind, I would ask —

speaker: TRUMP
text: I wouldn’t mind that at all.

speaker: TRUMP
text: No.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Wouldn’t mind it at all.

speaker: QUESTION
text: All right.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Well, let me — if I could call on —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Wouldn’t make any difference to me.

speaker: QUESTION
text: All right.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: If I could follow up on John, and John’s question.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Why is it, Mr. President, that you always seem to side with the accused and not the accuser?

speaker: QUESTION
text: You have three women here who are all making allegations, who are all asking that their stories be heard.

speaker: QUESTION
text: And, you know, if you look at the case of Roy Moore, if you look at the case of one of your staffers, you seem to, time and again, side with the accused and not the accuser.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Is that because of the many allegations that you’ve had made against you over the years?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, first of all, I wasn’t happy with Roy Moore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Let’s get that straight.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But Roy Moore was a Republican candidate —

speaker: QUESTION
text: But you stood by him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: — and I would have rather had a Republican candidate win.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I was very happy with Luther Strange, who was a terrific man from Alabama, but Luther Strange had a lot of things going against him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: As far as women, whether it’s a man or a woman, these are — you know, it can happen the other way.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Allegations can go the other way also.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You understand that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And whether it was a man or a woman, 30 years ago, 36 years ago — in fact, they don’t even know how many years ago because nobody knows what the time is.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s a long time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I could pick, as an example — hopefully I won’t have to do it as a replacement because hopefully this is going to go very well on Thursday.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s going to go very well on Monday, or Saturday, or Sunday, or whenever they vote.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I could pick a woman and she could have charges made from many years ago also.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But don’t you understand, sir, that many of these —

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I would look at the character —

speaker: QUESTION
text: — many of these accusers —

speaker: TRUMP
text: No, what I have to do —

speaker: QUESTION
text: — are reluctant to come forward.

speaker: QUESTION
text: You’ve raised doubts about these accusers.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Many of them are reluctant to come forward.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t think people are reluctant to come forward.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re going to have a chance to speak at a major — they have a major chance to speak.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But you’re saying why (inaudible) —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Excuse me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Excuse me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They have a major chance to speak.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it will be tomorrow, I assume.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’ve delayed this — meaning the Republican senators, not me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The Republicans senators have delayed this for weeks now.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re giving the women a major chance to speak.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now it’s possible I’ll hear that, and I’ll say, "Hey, I’m changing my mind"

speaker: TRUMP
text: That is possible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We want to give them a chance to speak.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they’re given —

speaker: QUESTION
text: Do you think all three should have a chance — all three should have a chance to speak?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, whoever is given a chance.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’ve delayed it a long time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they’re going to have a big shot at speaking and making their case.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I could be persuaded also.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please, go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I would like to go — yes, go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Thank you, Mr. President.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Thank you.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Thank you, Mr. President.

speaker: QUESTION
text: And a couple of questions for you to follow up on some answers that I didn’t quite hear from you, if you would allow me a couple of questions.

speaker: QUESTION
text: First of all, do you think these women — all three of them are liars?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Yes or no?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Have they been what?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Are they liars?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can’t tell you.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have to watch tomorrow.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have to read.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I just heard about one a little while ago.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can tell you her lawyer is a low life, okay?

speaker: TRUMP
text: So I can’t tell you whether or not they’re liars until I hear them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t know what happened today because I’ve been very busy with Japan, with South Korea, with China, and about seven other countries, as you know — and I chaired the Security Council.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So I don’t know about today’s person that came forward.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I do know about the lawyer.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you don’t get much worse — bad reputation, too.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Take a look at his past.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, as far as the other women are concerned, I’m going to see what happens tomorrow.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m going to be watching — you know, believe it or not.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m going to see what’s said.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s possible that they will be convincing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, with all of that being said, Judge Brett Kavanaugh has been, for many years, one of the most respected people in Washington.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He’s been on — I guess you’d call it the second highest court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And every single person knows him; a lot of people know him well. And those people don’t believe what’s going on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can always be convinced.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have to hear it.

speaker: QUESTION
text: It sounds like what you’re saying is, there is a situation, there is a scenario under which you would withdraw Brett Kavanaugh’s nomination.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Is that correct?

speaker: QUESTION
text: And have you talked about that with him?

speaker: TRUMP
text: If I thought he was — if I thought he was guilty of something like this, yeah sure.

speaker: QUESTION
text: And you will wait until tomorrow to make up your mind about it?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I want to watch.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I want to see.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I hope I can watch.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m meeting with a lot of countries tomorrow, but I will certainly, in some form, be able to watch.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I’ll also rely on some very fair and talented Republican senators who — look, if we brought George Washington here and we said, "We have George Washington," the Democrats would vote against him, just so you understand.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he may have had a bad past, who knows, you know.

speaker: SYSTEM
text: (LAUGHTER)

speaker: TRUMP
text: He may have had some, I think, accusations made.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Didn’t he have a couple of things in his past?

speaker: TRUMP
text: George Washington would be voted against 100 percent by Schumer and the con artists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I mean 100 percent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: One hundred percent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So it really doesn’t matter from their standpoint.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s why when John asked about the FBI — if the FBI did the most thorough investigation in the history of the FBI, and they found him to be 100-percent perfect, he would lose every single vote.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, if the Republicans win tomorrow, I think you’re going to get some votes from the Democrats.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know why?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because — we all know why — because it’s called politics.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Then you’ll probably get some votes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay, let’s go.

speaker: QUESTION
text: And my final question, sir,

speaker: TRUMP
text: One more question.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Yes.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Just to follow up —

speaker: TRUMP
text: She stands up: "I’d like to ask about three questions"

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s not really fair to everyone else.

speaker: QUESTION
text: This will be my last one —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Should I let her ask another question?

speaker: SYSTEM
text: (CROSSTALK)

speaker: QUESTION
text: — to follow up on —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: See?

speaker: QUESTION
text: — to follow up on a question that a colleague asked as well about the benefit of the doubt that you have given to people like Roy Moore, to Roger Ailes, to Bill O’Reilly, to Brett Kavanaugh.

speaker: QUESTION
text: They’re all men.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Why is that?

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s not a benefit of the doubt.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve —

speaker: QUESTION
text: Has there ever been an instance when you’ve given the benefit of the doubt to a woman?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve known them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Hallie, I’ve know them for a long time and — a lot of these people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A lot of people.

speaker: TRUMP

text: Okay.

text: I never met them.

text: I never met these people.

text: And, what did they do?

speaker: TRUMP

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it is a historic letter.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a beautiful — it’s a beautiful piece of art.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I think we’re going to make a deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Will we make a deal, Steve?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t really know.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I think we’re going to.

speaker: TRUMP
text: In the meantime — and I’ve said it a thousand — I don’t want to bore you: no rockets, no missiles, no nuclear tests — you know, for over a year, where you haven’t seen.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Before I got here, everybody in this room thought you were going to war.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then what happened — it was funny — they said, "He was terrible. He was so rough with Chairman Kim — Kim Jong Un. He was so rough. It’s terrible. He’s going to cause…"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, I had a great meeting with President Putin.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And on that one, they said, "He was too soft with President Putin"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I had a great meeting with the President.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It lasted for two hours.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We discussed everything: Ukraine, Syria, Israel and Israel’s protection.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had a great meeting.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They wanted me to end up in a boxing match.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: If I was killer-tough with President Putin, they would have said, "He was too tough"

speaker: TRUMP
text: You can’t win with these people, but you just keep going.

speaker: TRUMP
text: In the meantime, we’re doing well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: So how do you — how long do you —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Wait.

speaker: TRUMP
text: One second.

speaker: QUESTION
text: How long do you think it should take North Korea to denuclearize?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t know.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want to get into —

speaker: QUESTION
text: We’ve seen estimates of one year, two year —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Steve, I don’t want to get into the time game.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know why?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I told Mike Pompeo, I said, "Mike, don’t get into the time game"

speaker: TRUMP
text: We stopped them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re taking down plants.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re taking down a lot of different testing areas.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re going to take down some more.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You’ll be hearing about that very soon.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want to go ahead of myself, but you’ll be hearing about it soon.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They have no interest right now in testing nuclear.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, we had a case just about when I was coming into office — you all remember it — where there was a massive — they thought it was an earthquake.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A mountain moved over an inch and a half.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re talking about mountains.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, North Korea is very mountainous.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Beautiful land.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Beautiful.

speaker: TRUMP
text: This mountain actually shifted.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It shifted.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And somebody thought it was an earthquake.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then they found out, no, this was nuclear testing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Shifted a mountain.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now I’m talking about serious stuff.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Serious size.

speaker: TRUMP
text: When I came in, and certainly before I came in — and even at the beginning of mine because when I was having rhetorical contests — you know, contests, really, I guess you could call it — with Chairman Kim, which we both smile at now and we laugh at.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But everybody thought that was a horrible thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’ve had — many Presidents were unable to do anything, anything at all with North Korea.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We now have a good relationship.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have a good relationship.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And most importantly, all of the things that you’ve been hearing about –the horror stories — in my opinion, they’re gone.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, could they start up again?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m a deal guy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Could they start?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Could be that we don’t work it out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think — I have it right here — I think that what we’ve done behind the scenes, which nobody really knows about — and I don’t blame you for not knowing about, you know, personal letters, private letters.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But saying they want to get it done.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We know much more than the media for a change.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Much more.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But if you saw what’s going on behind the scenes, I think you’d very impressed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We were a country going to war.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I really believe that President Obama would admit that he said it’s by far his biggest problem.

speaker: TRUMP
text: When I sat with him, prior to going to office — going into office, he said to me that’s by far the biggest problem.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he said to me that he was very close to going into war.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And millions of people — not — you know, I — they say, "Oh, thousands of people…"

speaker: TRUMP
text: No, no, no, not thousands.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Millions of people would have been killed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And that could have left — you’re right next to China.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You’re right — that could have been a world war very easily.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Right now, we’re in a great position.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want to play the time game.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I told Mike Pompeo, "Don’t let them do that to you"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I haven’t given anything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And all of a sudden — we got back, it was a few weeks ago.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we were back like two and a half months from the summit, which was a great success.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And people are screaming, "What’s taking so long?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Oh, I get it"

speaker: TRUMP
text: You got to understand the media.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve been dealing with the media all my life.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Too much.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Too much.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re screaming and I saw that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And our guys were — and not Mike — but our guys were being, "Oh well, we’re working as fast…"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "I got all the time in the world. I don’t have to rush it"

speaker: TRUMP
text: There’s no — you know, secession of sanctions.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We got the sanctions on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I didn’t take any sanctions off.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I did see a reporter last night — a guy I like, personally, a lot.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he asked a question to President Moon of South Korea.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He said, "Why did the President give so much?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I didn’t give anything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I gave nothing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What have I given, other than some time?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, I flew to Singapore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had a meeting.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, giving would be if I took the sanctions off.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I didn’t want to do — if you asked General Mattis, for a year and a half, I said, "Why don’t we stop these ridiculous," in my opinion, "the military games?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I call them the "military games"

speaker: TRUMP
text: If I told you how much those games cost — and, frankly, I told South Korea, "You should be paying for these games"

speaker: TRUMP
text: We pay for them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They say, "Well, we fly the planes in from a short distance away"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Where is that?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Guam

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, huh.

speaker: TRUMP
text: How long a trip is that?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Seven hours

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, great

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re flying these massive bombers and everything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve wanted to stop this for a long time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I consider that an asset.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But we’ve done — we’re saving, by the way — just for the taxpayer, we’re saving a fortune.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And if we need them, we can start them up immediately.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If I think we need them, I’ll start them before the generals will start them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The fact is, this reporter said that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "What have we done? I haven’t given anything"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we’re really onto the cusp.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we’re really going to do something that’s going to be very important.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But we’re not playing the time game.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If it takes two years, three years, or five months, it doesn’t matter.

speaker: TRUMP
text: There’s no nuclear testing and there’s no testing of rockets.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, ma’am.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Please.

text: Thank you.

text: This is the one that was nodding with every nice thing I said, so watch this question.

text: Are you at all concerned at the message that has been sending — being sent to the women who are watching this when you use language like "con job" in relation to allegations of sexual assault?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, I’ve used much worse language in my life than "con job"

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s like probably the nicest phrase I’ve ever used.

text: I mean, con job — it is.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a con job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, confidence — it’s a confidence job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they short — it’s a con job by the Democrats.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They know it.

text: What about the message that’s being sent to women who are watching?

text: They did the same thing with the Russia investigation.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They tried to convince people that I had something to do with Russia.

speaker: TRUMP
text: There was no collusion.

text: Think of it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m in Wisconsin.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m in Michigan.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I say, "Gee, we’re not doing well"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I won both those states.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re not doing well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Uh, let me call the Russians to help

speaker: TRUMP
text: Does anybody really believe that?

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a con job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I watch these guys — Little Adam Schiff, and all of the guys.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He takes a call from a Russian who turned out to be a faker.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, he was a comedian or something.

speaker: TRUMP
text: This is so-and-so calling for… — he took the call.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why is the taking a call from a Russian?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Senator Warner took a call from a Russian.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He was a comedian or something, but he said, "We have pictures of President Trump"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, where can I get them?  If we ever did that, it would be like a big deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah, it’s a con job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it’s not a bad term.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s not a bad term at all.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Are you worried —

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ll tell you one thing I can say: I’ve had a lot of people talking about this to me, with respect to what’s happening, because it’s a horrible precedent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m going to have to get other judges and other Supreme Court judges, possibly.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I could have a lot of the Supreme Court judges, more than two.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And when I called up Brett Kavanaugh — spoke to him and his family — and told them that I chose them, they were so happy and so honored.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It was as though — I mean, the biggest thing that’s ever happened.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I understand that — U.S. Supreme Court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want to be in a position where people say, "No, thanks. No, thanks. I don’t want to"

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, "I spoke to somebody 38 years ago, and it may not be good"

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have a country to run.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We want the best talent in the world.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I’ll tell you this:  The people that have complained to me about it the most — about what’s happening — are women.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Women are very angry.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, I got 52 percent with women.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everyone said, "This couldn’t happen — 52 percent"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Women are so angry.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I, frankly, think that — I think they like what the Republicans are doing, but I think they would have liked to have seen it go a lot faster.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But give them their day in court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Let her have her day in court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Let somebody else have a day in court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But the ones that I find — I mean, I have men that don’t like it, but I have women that are incensed at what’s going on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve always said women are smarter than men.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve said that a lot and I mean it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But women are incensed at what’s going on.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes, go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead, in the back.

text: Sorry.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Thank you.

text: They’re great people.

text: They’re great fighters.

text: Mr. President, you always say you support your allies.

text: And, as you know, we’ve fought side-by-side.

text: And we have defeated ISIS, essentially, a very short while ago, in the Middle East.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we did it with a lot of help from the Kurds.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they are — they’re great fighters.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, some people are great fighters and some people aren’t.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The Kurds are great fighters.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they’re great, great people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we’re going to be working — we’re discussing that situation exactly right now.

speaker: TRUMP

speaker: TRUMP

text: Okay?

text: Mr. President, Susan Li from Fox Business.

text: Did you reject a one-on-one meeting with the Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau?

text: Yeah, I did.

text: Why?

text: Because his tariffs are too high, and he doesn’t seem to want to move, and I’ve told him, "Forget about it"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And frankly, we’re thinking about just taxing cars coming in from Canada.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s the motherlode.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s the big one.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re very unhappy with the negotiations and the negotiating style of Canada.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We don’t like their representative very much.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’ve taken advantage — I love Canada, by the way.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have so many friends.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have everybody, and so many friends.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But that has nothing to do with this; I’m representing the United States.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Mexico was totally — I mean, they were great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: By the way, the new President has been great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The deal is done.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, it has to go through Congress and, you know, a lot things have to happen.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But we’ve done — Bob Lighthizer, who’s here someplace.

text: Where’s Bob?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Bob.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Bob Lighthizer has done a great job of negotiating, as they have.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But the deal is done.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s up to Congress.

speaker: QUESTION
text: And, Mr. President —

text: But Canada has treated us very badly.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’ve treated our farmers in Wisconsin, and New York state, and a lot of other states very badly.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Dairy products — 300 percent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Three hundred percent.

speaker: TRUMP
text: How do you sell a dairy product at 300 percent?

speaker: TRUMP
text: The answer is:  You don’t.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What it is, is a barrier.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s — basically, they’re saying, "We don’t have any barriers. By the way, it’s 300 percent"

speaker: TRUMP
text: So you don’t send it in, because you can’t compete.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So Canada has a long way to go.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I must be honest with you, we’re not getting along at all with their negotiators.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We think their negotiators have taken advantage of our country for a long time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had people that didn’t know what they were doing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And that’s why we had — over the last five or six years, if you average it out, we had $800 billion a year in trade losses.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s ridiculous.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s not going to happen.

speaker: QUESTION
text: What about NAFTA?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Sir, Mr. President, NAFTA —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: What does that mean for NAFTA?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Will you be pulling out of NAFTA?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t like NAFTA.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I never liked it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s been very bad for the United States.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s been great for Canada.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s been great for Mexico.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Very bad for us.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But will you pull out of the —

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m not going to use the name "NAFTA"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I refuse to use it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve seen thousands of plants and factories close.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve seen millions of jobs lost to auto companies that moved.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I mean, Mexico has 25 percent of our auto business now because of NAFTA.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Under our deal, it’s not going to happen anymore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I hate to tell you, it’s not.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re going to keep companies.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I told the Mexicans, I said, "We have to keep companies"

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they’re getting a lot, also.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re getting other things.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re getting a lot of good things.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Mexico made a very good deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But with Canada, it’s very tough.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What we’re doing is if we made a deal with Canada — which is, you know, a good chance still.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I’m not making anything near what they want to do.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re going to be fair.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But you’re — are you going to notify Congress of pulling out of NAFTA?

speaker: TRUMP
text: What we’re probably going to do is call it the "USMC"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Like the United States Marine Corps, which I love.

speaker: TRUMP
text: General Kelly likes it even more.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Where’s General Kelly?

speaker: TRUMP
text: He likes that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: USMC — which would be U.S., Mexico, Canada.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But it’ll probably or possibly be just "USM"

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’ll be United States and Mexico.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Yes or no, are you going to —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Canada will come along.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, if Canada doesn’t make a deal with us, we’re going to make a much better deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re going to tax the cars that come in.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We will put billions and billions of dollars into our Treasury.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And frankly, we’ll be very happy because it’s actually more money than you can make, under any circumstance, with making a deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Good job, too.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You do a very good job.

text: Really good.

text: Yes, please.

text: About Iran, Mr. President.

speaker: QUESTION
text: About Iran, one question: What is your clear plan to stop Iranian influence in Iraq, in Syria, and especially in Iraqi Kurdistan?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, I think you’ve seen that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I must tell you, it’s — I don’t mind your question because —

text: Raheem Rashidi, from Kurdistan TV.

text: Thank you.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think there’s been no greater change — other than maybe China, because China — unfortunately, their markets have dropped — would you say, 30 percent in the last four months, right?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think I watched you recently when you said that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "I think she’s wrong. I think it’s actually 32. But that’s okay"

speaker: TRUMP
text: But a lot.

speaker: TRUMP
text: There’s been no — other than maybe that, but even that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because China is a very special place.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And Iran is a very special place.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I think there’s been no country that’s changed so much as Iran.

speaker: TRUMP
text: In the last six months, since I took off the horrible, horrible Iran nuclear deal, as they called it — one of the dumbest deals ever made.

speaker: TRUMP
text: As an example, why didn’t they take care of Yemen in the deal?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why didn’t they take care of Syria in the deal?

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know what Kerry said — the reason?

speaker: TRUMP
text: It was too complicated.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re giving $150 billion, we paid $1.8 billion in cash — cash.

speaker: TRUMP
text: This whole room would be filled up with hundred-dollar bills.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you’d need probably five rooms like this.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you have $1.8 billion in cash.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why didn’t we take care of Yemen?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why didn’t we take care of Syria and other?

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he said, "Because it was too complicated"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, you just gave all your cards.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You gave them $150 billion.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And now Yemen’s a mess, but it’s getting better.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And Syria’s a mess.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I was responsible — and I hope it stays that way — when I put out on social media, a few weeks ago, about Idlib Province.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Don’t do it"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I’ll tell you, it happened — where I was at a meeting with a lot of supporters, and a woman stood up and she said, "There’s a province in Syria with 3 million people. Right now, the Iranians, the Russians, and the Syrians are surrounding their province. And they’re going to kill my sister. And they’re going to kill millions of people in order to get rid of 25,000 or 35,000 terrorists or enemies of theirs"

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I think we can call them terrorists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I said, "That’s not going to happen"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I didn’t hear of Idlib Province.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I came back to New York, and I picked up the failing New York Times — I hate to admit it was the New York Times, but it was the failing New York Times.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I opened it up — not on the front page, but there was a very big story.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Wow, that’s the same story that the woman told me that I found hard to believe"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because why would — how would anyone do that with 3 million people?

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it said that they were being surrounded, and they were going in and starting — literally, the next day, they were going to drop bombs all over the place and perhaps kill millions of people in order to get 35,000 terrorists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I put out on social media and elsewhere — I gave Mike Pompeo, John Bolton, everybody these orders: "Don’t let it happen"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Don’t let it happen"

speaker: TRUMP
text: That doesn’t mean they can’t be selective.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They can’t be — you know, go in and they’ve got to do what they’ve got to do with terrorists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I assume they’re terrorists.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But don’t kill millions of people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it stopped.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You saw that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Nobody’s going to give me credit, but that’s okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because the people the people know.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I have had more Syrians thank me for that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: This was about four weeks ago, I put that out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "They’re surrounding a city of 3 million people. They’re going to start bombing the city. Don’t let it happen"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I meant it, too.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I meant it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And millions of people have been saved.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I gave, today, great credit to Iran.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t know if you heard that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I gave great credit to Iran, to Russia, and to Syria for not doing it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now I hope it’s going to be surgical — meaning go in and do — it’s lengthy and everything else.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they possibly have to do it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I think millions of people would have been killed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And that would have been a shame.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And hopefully — and I have to tell you, Turkey has been a big help.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Turkey has been great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Turkey has helped us very much with that whole situation.

text: Mr. President.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yes.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Touching back on Iran: Of course, this week, you put out a call to action to other countries to rally with America, to put pressure on Iran.

text: Rouhani is still calling for the U.S. to come back into the old deal.

speaker: QUESTION
text: But after meeting with world leaders this week, did you make any progress towards a potential new deal?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Doesn’t matter what world leaders think on Iran.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Iran’s going to come back to me and they’re going to make a good deal, I think.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Maybe not.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Deals — you never know.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they’re suffering greatly.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re having riots in every city, far greater than they were during the green period with President Obama.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Far greater.

speaker: TRUMP
text: When President Obama stuck up for government, not the people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You probably would have had a much different Iran had he not done that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I’m sticking up for the people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I am with the people of Iran.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But here’s the thing:  They have rampant inflation.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Their money is worthless.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everything is going wrong.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They have riots in the street.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You can’t buy bread.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You can’t do anything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a disaster.

speaker: TRUMP
text: At some point, I think they’re going to want to come back, and they’re going to say, "Hey, can we do something?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I’m very simple; I just don’t want them to have nuclear weapons.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s all.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Is that too much to ask?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want them to have nuclear weapons.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I want them to have a great economy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I want them to sell so much oil so that the oil prices — I’m not happy with OPEC.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I told them, "I’m not happy with OPEC"

speaker: TRUMP
text: We take care of all these people, we defend them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They wouldn’t be there for two weeks if it wasn’t for me, and the United States, and a much stronger armed forces than it was.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because our armed forces was depleted.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had old equipment.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, we have — hey, you know better than anybody — $700 billion and $716 billion.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have the most incredible new jets and everything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We need it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Not that I want to spend it, although it is jobs.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s all made in the United States.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But Iran has to come back, and they have to talk.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I’m not doing this from strength or weakness.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m just saying, at some point, I think they’re going to have to come back.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If you look at what’s going on, companies are leaving left and right.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Mercedes Benz just left.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re all leaving.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They don’t want to be in Iran.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because they have a choice: Do they want to be with Iran, or do they want to be with us?

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we have, by — we picked up $10 trillion since my election.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We were being caught by China.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now it’s going the other way.

speaker: TRUMP
text: People can’t believe it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: People have never seen this situation with China.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everything’s always been — for 20 years, "Oh, China is so great. China is so great"

speaker: TRUMP
text: You don’t hear that so much anymore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I love China; I think they’re great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you don’t hear that so much anymore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know who’s great now?

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’re great now.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay, how about just a couple more.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, I could be doing — I could be doing this all day long.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I could be doing this all day long.

text: Should we continue for a little while?

speaker: TRUMP
text: It doesn’t matter to me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A couple of more.

text: I don’t care.

text: New York Times, come on.

text: But I think ABC, CBS, NBC, the Times, the — they’re all going to endorse me, because if they don’t, they’re going out of business.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, I want to ask you: Yesterday, you were talking about your administration’s accomplishments at the United Nations, and a lot of the leaders laughed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why do you think they were laughing?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, that’s fake news.

text: And what was that experience like for you?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It was fake news.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it was covered that way.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, I said that, since my election, our economy has become the hottest in the world.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Tax reductions, regulations, confidence levels are the highest in 18 years — really, soon to be historic.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Unemployment is the lowest in the history of our country.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You look at Black unemployment.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You look at Asian unemployment.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You look at women — 65 years.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The unemployment numbers are among the best we’ve ever had ever.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The numbers of new companies pouring into our country, which nobody thought was possible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I said this.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I was in front of a large group of highly professional people, most of whom are from either other countries or the United Nations — people that aren’t big into clapping, applauding, smiling.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I heard a little rustle, as I said our country is now stronger than ever before.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s true.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I mean, it is true.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I heard a little rustle.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I said, "It’s true"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I heard smiles.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I said, "Oh, I didn’t know there there’d be that kind…"

speaker: TRUMP
text: They weren’t laughing at me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They were laughing with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had fun.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That was not laughing at me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So the fake news said, "People laughed at President Trump"

speaker: TRUMP
text: They didn’t laugh at me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: People had a good time with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We were doing it together.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We had a good time.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They respect what I’ve done.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The United States is respected again.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The United States was not respected.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everybody was taking advantage of us.

speaker: TRUMP
text: From jobs, and taking our companies, and not paying the price — to so many other things, even military protection.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I told a number of countries over the last few days, I said, "Listen, you’re a very rich country. We protect you. Without our protection, you would have real problems. You would have real problems."

speaker: QUESTION
text: And I — I want to —

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "You should reimburse us for this protection. Why are we protecting you?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And do you want to know what they said after about two minutes of talking?

speaker: TRUMP
text: They agreed with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you can ask this group of very talented people — they agreed with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they said — one of them said, "But Mr. President, nobody ever asked us for that. They never asked us for that"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Nobody has ever said, "You should pay"

speaker: TRUMP
text: These are really wealthy countries.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I mean, I’ll be honest, I just asked Japan.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "We’re defending you. You’re a very wealthy country. You’re sending us millions of cars. We have a tremendous trade deficit with you. And we’re defending you, and we’re subsidizing your military with a massive amount of money."

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said it to South Korea.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We have 32,000 soldiers in South Korea.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re a very wealthy — these are great countries.

speaker: TRUMP
text: These are very wealthy countries.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Why aren’t you reimbursing us for our costs?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: They look at me, and they can’t even answer it, because there’s no answer.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If they’re a poor country and they needed protection, and people were going to die, I’m all for protecting them; I don’t want 10 cents.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But when wealthy countries that have massive trade surpluses with us — massive — and then on top of that, we’re paying for their military?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Or we’re paying for a lot of their military?

speaker: TRUMP
text: That doesn’t work.

speaker: TRUMP
text: How about two more, and we’ll call it?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, really quickly.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Mr. President, you said you feel a kinship — you said you feel a kinship with Brett Kavanaugh and you — Mr. President, really quickly, you said you felt a kinship with Brett Kavanaugh.

text: You said that you also — your false allegations that you feel like were made against you make you feel like you don’t want to believe these women.

text: What message do you think that —

text: No, I didn’t say that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why do you say that?

speaker: QUESTION
text: So, please explain —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Fake news.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Please explain —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Why — did I say that?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Well, can you please explain then what you’re talking about in your own false allegations?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Excuse me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And by the way, I think you do a very good job, but I didn’t say that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I do watch you.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I think you do a very good job.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I didn’t say that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, exactly, "I look forward to watching her"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I do want to hear what she says.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And maybe she’ll say — I could be convinced of anything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Maybe, if she’ll say something — but in the meantime, I have to tell you, he’s one of the highest quality human beings.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He’s a tremendous man.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He’s a tremendous genius.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He’s a great intellect.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He was, I believe, number one at Yale.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Is that a correct statement?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Number one in his class at Yale.

speaker: QUESTION
text: So you don’t feel a kinship with him?

speaker: TRUMP
text: He was a great student in law.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He was — you know, I’ve heard his name.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I didn’t know him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Didn’t know him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Until this whole thing, I didn’t know him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I heard his name for 10 years.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you know how I heard his name?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everybody was saying he should be on the Supreme Court.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Who is he?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: His name is Brett Kavanaugh. And he should be — he’s the most brilliant person. He’s the most brilliant lawyer

speaker: TRUMP
text: They were talking about him on the Supreme Court 10 years ago.

speaker: TRUMP
text: With all of that, I want to hear what she has to say.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay?

speaker: QUESTION
text: But you said that you don’t feel — but you said that you feel like there have been numerous false allegations against you, and that because of that–

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, I’ve had many false —

text: — you feel that you understand what he might be going through.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve had many false statements against me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And if the press would have reported it, I would have been very happy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think John Roberts would tell you that — you covered the story where the women were paid to say bad things about me.

text: Sean Hannity covered it.

text: I will tell you, when I saw that on Sean Hannity, I actually called him.

text: Believe it or not, I don’t speak to him very much, but I respect him.

text: I called him.

text: I said, "This is the biggest story. This is a big, big story"

text: He agreed with me.

text: It’s a shame.

text: Okay.

text: Enough.

text: Well, I’d love to be able to make a deal with the Israelis and the Palestinians.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, my whole life, I was told that’s the toughest deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I disagree.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think healthcare is probably tougher, okay?

speaker: TRUMP
text: You want to know the truth.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But it is tough.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But we’re going to take care of that, too.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And that’s going to get taken care of.

speaker: TRUMP
text: We’ve already taken care of a lot of it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But the whole — my life, I’ve always heard the deal between, as you know, Israel and the Palestinians, that’s like the toughest deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Every possible thing is tough about that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we’re going to make a deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we’re going to make a deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, at one of our many meetings today, I was with Bibi Netanyahu, a man who I have a lot of respect for.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A man who has been extremely nice to me — very happy that I did the whole thing with Jerusalem and the embassy, which, by the way, we’re going to open in four months for less than $500,000.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And the budget was over $1 billion, right?

speaker: QUESTION
text: Yes.

speaker: QUESTION
text: That’s correct.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So we saved, let’s say, a billion dollars.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s not so bad.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it’s open.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it’s beautiful, by the way.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Jerusalem stone, one of my favorite stones.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I will tell you, the question — somebody said today, "Well, this is the first news conference in a long time"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "What do you mean? I did like, five today"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Every time I sit, I take a lot of questions from people that are screaming like maniacs in the back of the room — meaning, reporters.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And one of the reporters — I won’t say that it was John Roberts that said that, I refuse.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But one of the — it was, but that’s okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Don’t feel guilty, John.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But of the reporters that was screaming asked about the one-state, two-state.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I said, "I think the two-state will happen. I think it’s, in one way, more difficult because it’s a real estate deal — because you need metes and bounds, and you need lots of carveouts and lots of everything."

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think it’s, in one way, more difficult because it’s a real estate deal — because you need metes and bounds, and you need lots of carveouts and lots of everything.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s actually a little tougher deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But in another way, it works better because you have people governing themselves.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, they asked be about that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Well, I think the two-state will happen. I think we’re going to go down the two-state road"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I’m glad I got it out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And Jared, who is so involved — he loves Israel.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He loves Israel.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But he’s also going to be very fair with the Palestinians.

speaker: TRUMP
text: He understands it takes two people to be happy — two groups of people to be happy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Everybody has got to be happy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And that’s why it’s so tough, because there’s been so much hatred and anger for so many years.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s what, probably, the number-one ingredient of toughness is.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they asked me — I said I think it’s going to be a two-state.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you know what I did today?

speaker: TRUMP
text: By saying that, I put it out there.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And if you ask most of the people in Israel, they agree with that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But nobody wanted to say it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a big thing to put it out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s a very big thing to put it out.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, the bottom line: If the Israelis and the Palestinians want one state, that’s okay with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If they want two states, that’s okay with me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m happy if they’re happy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’m a facilitator.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I want to see if I can get a deal done so that people don’t get killed anymore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: When we had — in Saudi Arabia, we had one of the great conferences in history.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Many of you were there; probably all of you were there.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It was one of the most beautiful two days.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That, and China — two of the most incredible events I’ve ever seen.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ve never seen anything like it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we had, I believe, 58 Muslim countries — the leaders.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The kings, the emirs, the absolute leaders from every — there was nobody in second place.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They were the leaders of the whole thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And unbeknownst to anybody else, people would come up to me, individually — it wasn’t a setup.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’d come up to me and say, "Sir, you can’t have peace in the Middle East without peace between the Israelis and the Palestinians"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I said, "Why? What difference? Why does that matter so much?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: They said, "It just is impossible to make peace in the Middle East unless you have between the Israelis…"

speaker: TRUMP
text: So, I heard that from one — the King of Saudi Arabia, who is a great guy — King Salman.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then, somebody else came up.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And he wasn’t told, "Oh, go up and say it"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I know where they’re coming from.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I must have had 12 leaders say it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they just said it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I started to realize that peace between Israel and the Palestinians, for the Middle East, is a very important thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we’re trying very hard to get it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think, probably, two-state is more likely.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: If they do a single, if they do a double, I’m okay with it if they’re both happy.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If they’re both happy, I’m okay with either.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think the two-state is more likely.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay, how about one — go ahead.

speaker: QUESTION
text: New York Times?

speaker: QUESTION
text: New York Times?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Oh, okay.

speaker: QUESTION
text: Thank you, sir.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I would have gotten bad story in the New York Times.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I will anyways, so I guess it doesn’t matter.

text: We’re — we’re kind of, uh —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay, we’ll do you after that.

speaker: QUESTION
text: We’re kind of, uh —

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then we’ll call it quits.

speaker: QUESTION
text: We’re kind of thriving, not failing these days.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You’re doing very well.

text: Say, "Thank you, Mr. Trump"

speaker: TRUMP
text: I wonder how you do — you know, all my life, I’ve had very few stories — but I’ve had some on the front page of the New York Times.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Now, I think I think I average about three or four a day, right?

speaker: QUESTION
text: That is —

speaker: TRUMP
text: And, of the three or four, they’re all negative.

speaker: TRUMP
text: No matter what I do, they’re negative.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s okay.

speaker: TRUMP

speaker: QUESTION
text: I wanted to come back to China, because I think what you announced today was really important.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I agree.

speaker: QUESTION
text: You talk about this friendship you have with Xi Jinping, and yet, essentially, what you did today is accused his government —

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s right.

speaker: QUESTION
text: — of interfering in our internal affairs —

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s right.

speaker: QUESTION
text: — subverting our Democratic process, and doing it to hurt you, the Republican Party —

speaker: TRUMP
text: Doing it to help them.

speaker: QUESTION
text: — and your backers.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Yeah.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Doing it to help them.

speaker: QUESTION
text: So how can a guy who does that be your friend?

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think that we are able to — and maybe he’s not anymore.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I’ll be honest with you, I think we had a very good friendship.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we had a very good relationship; we understand each other.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They are doing studies on Donald Trump.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re trying to figure it all out because this has never happened to them before.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s never happened.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Think of it, you’ve never seen — you’ve covered very well — you’ve never seen this happen.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re having big problems.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want them to have problems, but they got to make a fair deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Just like Canada has got to make a fair deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I believe that he and I have a very good chemistry together.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And I can tell you that about many leaders.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can also tell you a few where I don’t feel I’ll ever have a chemistry with them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t want to have a chemistry with them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And for those people, I’ll have Pompeo, Nikki, Bolton, Jared.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can go — our general; I’ll have our general.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Or if they can’t do it, I’ll have Sarah Huckabee do it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Right?

speaker: TRUMP
text: But for the most part, I have very good — very good with Prime Minister Abe.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Very good with President Moon.

speaker: TRUMP
text: By the way, what President Moon said last night — I know you won’t report it — but Bret Baier interviewed him last night and he asked him about me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I can’t say — because you would say I’m too braggadocios — but what he said about me last night was an unbelievable thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Couldn’t have happened without President Trump, and it never would happen without President Trump. TRUMP And nobody else could do it

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, I mean, you’ll take a look.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But I will tell you, China is very special.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Very special.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re incredible people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It’s an incredible country.

speaker: TRUMP
text: What they’ve done is unbelievable.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it all started with the WTO.

speaker: TRUMP
text: It was a defective deal.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And it all started — without the WTO, China is not China as we know it today.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And then it started also by — our people that are standing right in this position, that are in the Oval Office — another way of saying it — allowed them to get away with murder.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Allowed a lot of countries to get away with murder.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I think we still probably have a very good relationship.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But you know what?

speaker: TRUMP
text: In honor of you, I will, tomorrow, make a call to him.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Say, "Hey, how you doing?"

speaker: TRUMP
text: Okay?

text: Can I — can I just ask —

speaker: TRUMP
text: You don’t mind paying billions of dollars a month in tariffs.

speaker: QUESTION
text: I just had two small follow-ups.

speaker: QUESTION
text: One is, how would you compare the level of interference you see today from the Chinese to what Russia did in 2016?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Well, I think it’s different.

speaker: TRUMP
text: If you look at the Des Moines Register, I mean, they have ads that are made to look like editorials.

speaker: TRUMP
text: Saying about, "Oh, you got to stop Trump. You got to stop him. You got to vote against him"

speaker: TRUMP
text: My farmers are so incredible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: These are patriots.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know, on a network that doesn’t like me very much — which is most of them — but a network that didn’t — doesn’t really treat me very good, they interviewed farmers.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they got hurt because, you know, all of a sudden China stops buying.

speaker: TRUMP
text: By the way, they’ve started buying again.

speaker: TRUMP
text: I don’t know if you’ve noticed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And soybeans are going up, and things are going up.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And we’ve had very little hurt from what I’ve done.

speaker: TRUMP
text: In fact, the markets have gone up.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And the farmers are going to do great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But, ultimately — but they had farmers, and these guys are amazing; I love them.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they voted for me and they love me.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And they said, "We don’t care if we get hurt. He’s doing the right thing"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And, you know, a lot of people — it’s a complex game.

speaker: TRUMP
text: A lot of people don’t know exactly what it is.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They don’t know how to define "tariff"

speaker: TRUMP
text: They don’t know it is really different than a tax, although it’s getting close.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But they know that for the first time in many, many years, they have a President that’s fighting for them; that’s not letting their jobs be taken to other countries; that’s not allowing the kind of abuse that we — I mean, when you look at what happened, as an example, with NAFTA.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And for years — because it was never changed — NAFTA was defective deal the day it was signed.

speaker: TRUMP
text: You know why?

speaker: TRUMP
text: Because they had a VAT tax of 17 percent and nobody from this country knew that.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And by the time they found out, which was about a week later, nobody went and changed it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So you went many years and they never changed it.

speaker: TRUMP
text: There was a VAT tax that Mexico got.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So we were 17 or 16 points behind, before we even started.

speaker: TRUMP
text: NAFTA was a horrible thing.

speaker: TRUMP
text: So the farmers and — by the way, the steel workers — you know, I stopped the dumping.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The dumping was horrible.

speaker: TRUMP
text: And now if they want to dump, that’s okay, but they’ve got to pay the United States of America 25 percent on everything they dump.

speaker: TRUMP
text: That’s okay.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But as I told you before, steel is doing phenomenally well.

speaker: TRUMP
text: But the farmers say, "This man is fighting for us. No President has ever fought for us before"

speaker: TRUMP
text: And you really have to study what’s happened over the 15 years with the farm.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The farmers have been decimated over a 15-year period.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’ve been decimated.

speaker: TRUMP
text: The farmers are going to come out great.

speaker: TRUMP
text: These are great people.

speaker: TRUMP
text: They’re great, great patriots.

text: I think we should finish with that one.

text: So I could have you chosen for a position.
